message.content:
Thoroughly explore the SPLICE codebase focusing on all UI/frontend components. Examine:
1. All React components and their props/state management
2. Page layouts and routing
3. Forms, inputs, and user interactions
4. Error states, loading states, and edge cases in UI
5. Responsive design and accessibility concerns
6. Any broken imports, missing components, or UI bugs

Document all issues that would prevent a polished SaaS-level user experience. Be very thorough.

    39→function Button({

    41→  variant = "default",
    42→  size = "default",

    44→  ...props

    46→  VariantProps<typeof buttonVariants> & {
    47→    asChild?: boolean
    48→  }) {
    49→  const Comp = asChild ? Slot : "button"
    50→
    51→  return (
    52→    <Comp
    53→      data-slot="button"
    54→      data-variant={variant}
    55→      data-size={size}
    56→      className={cn(buttonVariants({ variant, size, className }))}
    57→      {...props}
    58→    />
    59→  )
    60→}

import { Metadata } from "next"; import { Header } from "@/components/landing/Header"; import { Footer } from "@/components/landing/Footer"; import Link from "next/link"; export const metadata: Metadata = { title: "Refund Policy - SPLICE", description: "SPLICE refund policy - our commitment to customer satisfaction.", }; export default function RefundPage() { return (

Refund Policy

Last updated: December 27, 2025

14-Day Free Trial

All SPLICE subscription plans include a 14-day free trial. During this period, you have full access to all features included in your chosen plan. You will not be charged until your trial ends, and you can cancel at any time during the trial with no obligation.

7-Day Money-Back Guarantee

If you are not satisfied with SPLICE after your trial ends, you may request a full refund within 7 days of your first payment. No questions asked.

To request a refund, simply email us at support@splice.app with your account email address. Refunds are typically processed within 5-10 business days.

Subscription Cancellation

You may cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings or by contacting support. Upon cancellation:

  • You will retain access until the end of your current billing period
  • No additional charges will be made after cancellation
  • Unused credits do not roll over and are not refundable

Non-Refundable Items

The following are not eligible for refunds:

  • Payments made more than 7 days after the initial charge
  • Overage charges for usage beyond plan limits
  • Partial month refunds for mid-cycle cancellations
  • Accounts terminated for Terms of Service violations

Annual Subscriptions

Annual subscriptions are eligible for a prorated refund if cancelled within the first 30 days. After 30 days, annual subscriptions are non-refundable but you will retain access for the remainder of your subscription term.

Technical Issues

If you experience technical issues that prevent you from using SPLICE, please contact our support team first. We are committed to resolving technical problems and may offer extended trial periods or account credits as appropriate.

Contact Us

For refund requests or questions about this policy, please contact:

Email: support@splice.app

Please include your account email and the reason for your refund request. We aim to respond to all refund requests within 24-48 hours.

For more information, see our{" "} Terms of Service {" "} and{" "} Privacy Policy .

Perfect! Now I have a comprehensive overview of the UI/frontend codebase. Let me compile a detailed audit report with all the issues I've found. ## Comprehensive SPLICE Frontend UI/UX Audit Report Based on a thorough examination of the SPLICE website codebase, I've identified numerous UI/UX issues and concerns that would prevent a polished SaaS-level user experience. Here are my findings: --- ### CRITICAL ISSUES #### 1. **Login Page - Demo Functionality Not Implemented** **Location:** `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-website/src/app/login/page.tsx` **Issue:** The login page is a complete demo with no actual authentication. It shows an alert "This is a demo login page" instead of functional login. For a SaaS product, this is a critical blocker. ```typescript const handleLogin = async (e: React.FormEvent) => { // Mock login delay await new Promise((resolve) => setTimeout(resolve, 1500)); setIsLoading(false); alert("This is a demo login page."); }; ``` **Impact:** Users cannot access their accounts or dashboard. This should connect to actual authentication infrastructure. #### 2. **Checkout Page - Missing Stripe Integration Logic** **Location:** `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-website/src/app/checkout/page.tsx` **Issue:** The checkout flow attempts to call `/api/checkout` endpoint but there's no clear error handling or response validation for payment failures. - No network error handling beyond a generic try/catch - No validation that the Stripe session was created successfully - No retry mechanism for failed API calls - Missing payment method selection UI #### 3. **Contact Form - No Validation or Backend** **Location:** `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-website/src/app/contact/page.tsx` **Issue:** Form submission logs to console without actually sending data anywhere: ```typescript const handleSubmit = async (e: React.FormEvent) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log("Form submitted:", formData); setSubmitted(true); }; ``` **Impact:** Leads/enterprise inquiries are never captured. The "Thanks for reaching out" message is misleading. #### 4. **Footer Logo Image Path Issue** **Location:** `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-website/src/components/landing/Footer.tsx:56` **Issue:** Footer uses incorrect logo path: ```typescript src="/images/logo.jpg" ``` But header uses `.svg`: ```typescript // Header.tsx:71 src="/images/logo.svg" ``` **Impact:** Inconsistent branding, potential broken image in footer. Should standardize on SVG. --- ### MAJOR ISSUES #### 5. **Pricing Page - Unsustainable Urgency Tactics** **Location:** `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-website/src/app/pricing/page.tsx` **Issues:** - **Countdown timer that never resets:** Uses `new Date(now.getFullYear(), now.getMonth() + 1, 0)` - calculates end of current month, but when viewed on Dec 31st or late in month, countdown becomes meaningless - **Fake scarcity:** "Only X spots left at this price" with hardcoded values (47, 23, 8) - clearly not dynamic. These never update and will eventually be contradicted by reality - **Misleading "beta pricing"** banner that contradicts other pages showing this is production pricing **Impact:** Damages trust when users see through these tactics. SaaS products should use honest urgency. #### 6. **Hero Section - Video Playback Not Configured** **Location:** `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-website/src/components/landing/Hero.tsx:13` **Issue:** ```typescript const DEMO_VIDEO_URL = "/videos/splice-demo.mp4"; ``` The video path is hardcoded but the file likely doesn't exist. No fallback or error handling if video fails to load. #### 7. **Exit Intent Popup - Aggressive and Potentially Disruptive** **Location:** `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-website/src/components/landing/ExitIntentPopup.tsx` **Issues:** - Triggers on `mouseleave` event at `clientY <= 0` (leaving from top), which can be overly aggressive - Uses localStorage to track dismissals, creating cookie-like tracking without explicit consent - The 24-hour cooldown is hardcoded - no user preference system - Offers "WELCOME20" coupon code that's not validated anywhere in the checkout flow #### 8. **Landing Page - Multiple Inconsistent Brand Colors** **Issues across components:** - Header uses `#00D4FF` cyan - Some buttons use `from-violet-600 to-cyan-600` gradients - Cards use `border-[#00D4FF]/30` with varying opacity levels - Inconsistent hover states and transitions - Some sections hardcode dark colors like `bg-[#060b14]`, `bg-[#0d1420]`, `bg-[#0a0f1a]` instead of using consistent theme variables **Impact:** Visual inconsistency, difficult to maintain, doesn't feel premium. --- ### FORM & INPUT ISSUES #### 9. **Contact Form - Missing Required Field Validation** **Location:** `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-website/src/app/contact/page.tsx:120-202` **Issues:** - `teamSize` dropdown has no required attribute even though it's business-relevant - No form-level validation before submission - No field-level error messages - TextArea has no character limit or validation - No loading state during submission (form doesn't disable) - Reset functionality missing after successful submission #### 10. **Email Inputs - No Error States** **Multiple locations (login, checkout, contact)** **Issues:** - Input component accepts `aria-invalid` but no visual feedback for invalid states - No inline error messages - No validation feedback before form submission - Checkout page does validate email with regex but shows error in a red box without visual field highlighting --- ### RESPONSIVE DESIGN ISSUES #### 11. **Hero Dashboard Mockup - Mobile Layout Problems** **Location:** `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-website/src/components/landing/Hero.tsx:248-320` **Issues:** - Sidebar is `hidden sm:flex` - completely hidden on mobile but takes significant width - On small screens, the entire mockup becomes cramped and unreadable - Floating mockups (Parameters, Results cards) are `hidden lg:block` - missing from 50% of viewport sizes - No mobile-optimized version of the complex dashboard visualization #### 12. **Download Page - Multi-Step Tabs Not Responsive** **Location:** `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-website/src/app/download/page.tsx:319-369` **Issues:** - Version/OS selector buttons stack poorly on mobile - Installation steps don't adapt well to narrow screens - Code blocks with copy button don't scroll properly on mobile - `flex flex-col sm:flex-row` gaps are inconsistent #### 13. **Pricing Cards - Overflow on Mobile** **Location:** `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-website/src/components/landing/Pricing.tsx:190-292` **Issues:** - Grid is `md:grid-cols-3` - means all 3 cards stack on tablets too - Feature lists have many items and don't scroll well on small screens - "Most Popular" badge positioning breaks on mobile when card scales --- ### ACCESSIBILITY & SEMANTIC ISSUES #### 14. **Logo in Header - Missing Alt Text on Fallback** **Location:** `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-website/src/components/landing/Header.tsx:69-76` **Issue:** ```typescript ``` While alt text is present, if the image fails to load, there's no fallback display. #### 15. **Buttons Without Proper ARIA Labels** **Multiple locations:** - Mobile menu button: Has `aria-label="Toggle menu"` ✓ but others don't - Copy button in download: Has `aria-label="Copy to clipboard"` ✓ - Toggle switches in pricing: Has `aria-label="Toggle billing period"` ✓ - Issue: Some icon-only buttons lack labels (e.g., social links in footer) #### 16. **Focus Management Issues** **Exit Intent Popup:** `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-website/src/components/landing/ExitIntentPopup.tsx` - Modal appears without focus trap - Users can tab out of modal to interact with page behind it - No keyboard accessibility for dismissal #### 17. **Color Contrast in Dark Mode** **Potential issues:** - Gray-400 text (`text-gray-400`) on dark backgrounds may not meet WCAG AA standards - Some hover states with `hover:text-[#00D4FF]` might have contrast issues - Table in pricing page: `text-gray-300` on `bg-[#0d1420]` - need to verify contrast ratio --- ### STATE MANAGEMENT & ERROR HANDLING #### 18. **No Error Boundaries** **Issue:** No error boundary components defined. If any component throws an error, it will cause white screen of death instead of graceful degradation. #### 19. **Missing Loading States** **Issues across pages:** - Hero section doesn't indicate when demo video is loading - Contact form: form doesn't disable while submitting (can submit multiple times) - Checkout: uses `isLoading` state but no visual indication beyond button text - Success page: shows `Suspense` fallback but only for initial load, not during data fetch #### 20. **No Offline Handling** **Location:** All API calls (checkout, contact form submission) **Issue:** No network error detection or offline fallback UI. Users might think form was submitted when network is down. #### 21. **API Response Handling** **Location:** `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-website/src/app/checkout/success/page.tsx:35-51` **Issues:** - `fetch` for checkout session doesn't check if response is OK before parsing JSON - No timeout for API calls - Silent failures (empty `catch` block just sets `isLoading(false)`) ```typescript try { const res = await fetch(`/api/checkout?session_id=${sessionId}`); const data = await res.json(); // Could throw if not valid JSON // No check for res.ok if (!cancelled) { setSessionData(data); setIsLoading(false); } } catch { if (!cancelled) setIsLoading(false); // Silently fails } ``` --- ### INTERACTIVE COMPONENT ISSUES #### 22. **Pricing Billing Toggle - No Visual Feedback** **Location:** `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-website/src/components/landing/Pricing.tsx:154-186` **Issue:** Motion animation on toggle is smooth but: - Toggle happens immediately without transition - No ripple effect or visual feedback on click - Annual/monthly text changes color abruptly #### 23. **Accordion Component - No Animation State** **Location:** `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-website/src/app/pricing/page.tsx` **Issue:** Uses Radix UI Accordion but no custom animations. Feels stiff compared to other animated components on page. #### 24. **Navigation Links - Inconsistent Scroll Behavior** **Location:** `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-website/src/components/landing/Header.tsx:25-49` **Issues:** - Custom scroll-to-section logic is complex and may not handle hash links properly if user navigates between pages - On non-home pages, `router.push("/" + href)` assumes hash links exist on home page - No scroll position restoration after navigation --- ### MISSING FEATURES & DEAD LINKS #### 25. **About Page Missing** **Location:** Footer and header reference `/about` **Files:** `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-website/src/components/landing/Footer.tsx:20` ```typescript { href: "/about", label: "About" }, ``` **Issue:** Page doesn't exist, will 404. #### 26. **Blog Missing** **Same footer issue:** ```typescript { href: "/blog", label: "Blog" }, ``` #### 27. **Careers Page Missing** **Same issue** - `/careers` referenced but not implemented #### 28. **Changelog Missing** **Link:** `/changelog` - referenced but doesn't exist #### 29. **Download Links - No Real Files** **Location:** `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-website/src/app/download/page.tsx:45,62` ```typescript downloadUrl: "/downloads/splice-uxp-v6.0.3.zip", downloadUrl: "/downloads/splice-cep-v6.0.3.zip", ``` **Issue:** These download files don't exist. Users will get 404 when clicking "Already have a license? Download directly" #### 30. **Dashboard/Account Area Missing** **Issue:** Login page exists but there's no dashboard, account settings, or license activation flow. Users who somehow authenticate have nowhere to go. --- ### CSS & ANIMATION ISSUES #### 31. **Waveform Animation - Hydration Mismatch Risk** **Location:** `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-website/src/components/landing/Hero.tsx:32-45` **Issue:** Pre-generated `WAVEFORM_BARS` data is good (avoids hydration mismatch), but the animation state might still cause issues if animations differ between server and client. #### 32. **Button Glow Effects - Performance Issue** **Location:** `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-website/src/app/globals.css:251-258` **Issue:** ```css .btn-glow { box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.4); transition: all 0.3s ease; } .btn-glow:hover { box-shadow: 0 0 30px rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.6); } ``` - Multiple box-shadows with blur radius can impact performance on low-end devices - Using `all` in transition is inefficient - should target specific properties - No `will-change` hint for browsers #### 33. **Hero Animated Gradients - CPU Intensive** **Location:** `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-website/src/components/landing/Hero.tsx:60-84` **Issue:** Multiple animated elements with `animate` and `repeat: Infinity`: ```typescript animate={{ scale: [1, 1.2, 1], opacity: [0.3, 0.5, 0.3], }} transition={{ duration: 8, repeat: Infinity, }} ``` - Four animated background orbs running simultaneously - No `reduced-motion` media query respect for accessibility - Could cause jank on mobile/low-power devices --- ### DATA & CONSISTENCY ISSUES #### 34. **Inconsistent Feature Lists** **Comparison:** -
